About.Hours & facilities: Open 8:30am-4:00pm. Reference assistance available by mail. Referral to paid researchers available.

About.Acquisition focus: Any information relating to the history and activities of the area.

About.Major holdings: Wadeye Press: Photographs, Drawings etc 1935- . O.L.S.H. School: Photographs, Rolls etc. Community Council: Minutes, Letters, Accounts. Records of various Catholic orders, records of store, workshops, Council, clinic, air group. Records of Port Keats Aboriginal Family History. Anthropological material.
